ar_BH {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%z%c%T%s%b%e%r" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u062F.\u0628.",
            "BHD ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Arabic language locale for Bahrein" }
        Source { "IBM Globalization Center of Competency, Yamato Software Laboratory" }
        Address { "1623-14, Shimotsuruma, Yamato-shi, Kanagawa-ken, 242-8502, Japan" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Arabic" }
        Territory { "Bahrein" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-07-20" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[\u0646].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[\u0644].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%p%t%f%t%g" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "Mr." }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "Miss." }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "Mrs." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "Ms." }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.000;\u00A4 #,##0.000-",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c ;%a ;%l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "973" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
                    "\u0635",
                    "\u0645",
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "z hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "z hh:mm:ss ",
                    "z hh:mm:ss ",
                    "z hh:mm:ss ",
                    "dd MMM, yyyy aa",
                    "dd MMM, yyyy z hh:mm:ss aa",
                    "dd MMM, yyyy",
                    "dd MMM, yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u062D",
                            "\u0646",
                            "\u062B",
                            "\u0631",
                            "\u062E",
                            "\u062C",
                            "\u0633",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u0627\u0644\u0623\u062D\u062F",
                            "\u0627\u0644\u0627\u062B\u0646\u064A\u0646",
                            "\u0627\u0644\u062B\u0644\u0627\u062B\u0627\u0621",
                            "\u0627\u0644\u0623\u0631\u0628\u0639\u0627\u0621",
                            "\u0627\u0644\u062E\u0645\u064A\u0633",
                            "\u0627\u0644\u062C\u0645\u0639\u0629",
                            "\u0627\u0644\u0633\u0628\u062A",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "\u064A\u0646\u0627",
                            "\u0641\u0628\u0631",
                            "\u0645\u0627\u0631",
                            "\u0623\u0628\u0631",
                            "\u0645\u0627\u064A",
                            "\u064A\u0648\u0646",
                            "\u064A\u0648\u0644",
                            "\u0623\u063A\u0633",
                            "\u0633\u0628\u062A",
                            "\u0623\u0643\u062A",
                            "\u0646\u0648\u0641",
                            "\u062F\u064A\u0633",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "\u064A\u0646\u0627\u064A\u0631",
                            "\u0641\u0628\u0631\u0627\u064A\u0631",
                            "\u0645\u0627\u0631\u0633",
                            "\u0623\u0628\u0631\u064A\u0644",
                            "\u0645\u0627\u064A\u0648",
                            "\u064A\u0648\u0646\u064A\u0648",
                            "\u064A\u0648\u0644\u064A\u0648",
                            "\u0623\u063A\u0633\u0637\u0633",
                            "\u0633\u0628\u062A\u0645\u0628\u0631",
                            "\u0623\u0643\u062A\u0648\u0628\u0631",
                            "\u0646\u0648\u0641\u0645\u0628\u0631",
                            "\u062F\u064A\u0633\u0645\u0628\u0631",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
